title: Ragu Bolognese
ingredients: ['450g lean minced beef', '2 rashers streaky bacon (unsmoked)', '1 1/2 - 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 med onion, finely diced', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '1/2 (400g) tin Italian tomatoes', '2 heaped tablespoons tomato puree', '1/2 glass red wine', '1 tsp dried basil', 'salt and fresh black pepper to taste', '1 beef stock cube']
